::DeathStorm/Shredder::

DeathStorm kicks Shredder into yet another tree. Shredder rolls out of the 
way of DeathStorm's follow up shot. He groans. This battle was not going well 
for him. The assassing clearly outskilled him. He jumps up and runs farther 
away, activating his comm-link.

"Megatron, Quickstrike, anyone, slag it all! I need help here!" He yells into 
it, half tripping over the undergrowth as he ran with DeathStorm right on his 
tail.
